title: The Boys in the Band: Something Personal
short_cast: Jim Parsons, Zachary Quinto, Matt Bomer, Andrew Rannells, Charlie Carver, Robin de Jesús, Brian Hutchison, Michael Benjamin Washington, Tuc Watkins, Joe Mantello, Ned Martel, Mart Crowley
cast: Jim Parsons, Zachary Quinto, Matt Bomer, Andrew Rannells, Charlie Carver, Robin de Jesús, Brian Hutchison, Michael Benjamin Washington, Tuc Watkins, Joe Mantello, Ned Martel, Mart Crowley
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: Decades after his play first put gay life center stage, Mart Crowley joins the cast and crew of the 2020 film to reflect on the story's enduring legacy.
